prompt: How does data warehousing support business intelligence?

criteria.name: Understanding of Data Warehousing
criteria.description: Demonstrates knowledge of data warehousing concepts, architecture, and ETL.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Explains data warehousing concepts, components, and ETL in detail.
performance_descriptors.good: Describes main ideas of data warehousing and mentions ETL.
performance_descriptors.average: States what a data warehouse is with limited detail.
performance_descriptors.needs_improvement: Mentions data warehousing but lacks clarity.

criteria.name: Connection to Business Intelligence
criteria.description: Explains how data warehousing enables BI tools, reporting, and analytics.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Strongly connects warehousing to BI activities such as analytics, dashboards, and decision-making.
performance_descriptors.good: Describes at least two BI activities supported by warehousing.
performance_descriptors.average: General mention of BI without detail.
performance_descriptors.needs_improvement: Weak or unclear link between warehousing and BI.

criteria.name: Real-World Examples
criteria.description: Uses relevant examples of data warehousing in BI.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Multiple, specific, and relevant examples given.
performance_descriptors.good: At least one relevant example provided.
performance_descriptors.average: Example is vague or minimally described.

criteria.name: Structure and Academic Style
criteria.description: Presents answer in a logical and academic style.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Highly organized and formal academic response.
performance_descriptors.good: Clear structure and mostly formal style.

key_points: Explains data warehousing concepts, ETL, and integration
Links warehousing to BI tools, analytics, dashboards, and decision-making
llm_questions: What is a data warehouse and its components?
How does ETL work in data warehousing?
How does a data warehouse enable BI tools?
What are real-world examples of data warehousing in BI?
Why is data warehousing important for decision-making?
